snippet: This school of political morals, which begins with teaching as that the Fugitive Slave compact of the Constitution is an " atrocious bargain," and in its progress advises or even countenances resistance to the enactments made under it, sometimes p...
lead_paragraph: This school of political morals, which begins with teaching as that the Fugitive Slave compact of the Constitution is an " atrocious bargain," and in its progress advises or even countenances resistance to the enactments made under it, sometimes pronouncing them "unconstitutional," and at other times "both against conscience and God;" and afterwards palliates or perverts all the atrocities of resistance,
